ygData.subject: RE: healing song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... increased ... If your party spreads the damage around, healing can be much more effective. The 7hp/tick can easily turn into 42hp/tick I agree that
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
>
> I personally don't twist, I may switch up songs in battle if the needs
> arise, but I have never found twisting to be that big a benefit. At 17th
> level the healing song only restores 7hp/tick while standing, and the
> average monster is hitting for 20-50 pts per hit, so the heal isn't worth
> it, when if I play anthem and it doesn't ever quit they get a more
increased
> attack rate, so therefore they do more damage.

If your party spreads the damage around, healing can be much more effective.
The 7hp/tick can easily turn into 42hp/tick

I agree that 7hp/tick is not worth it, but if three or more people are
damaged, then the 21+ hps may make it more worthwhile. Play around will all
your songs to find out which ones are the most beneficial in your group.



Wayne
